GwenUtil.h
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 //
2 // GwenUtil.h - Utilites for Gwen ImportExport.
3 //
4 // Note: This is done to remove the dependency on Bootil and keep the Gwen and the editor self
5 // contained. Bootil contains a lot of other stuff that we don't want. Import needs to be
6 // able to be used by the client app, and Gwen "dropped in".
7 //
8 
9 #include <string>
10 #include <list>
11 
12 #pragma once
13 #ifndef IMPORTEXPORT_UIDATA_H
14 #define IMPORTEXPORT_UIDATA_H
15 
16 namespace GwenUtil
17 {
18  typedef std::string BString;
19  typedef std::wstring WString;
20 
21 #define GWENUTIL_FOREACH(varname, arrayname, arraytype) \
22  for (arraytype::iterator varname = arrayname.begin(); varname != arrayname.end(); ++varname)
23 
24 #define GWENUTIL_FOREACH_CONST(varname, arrayname, arraytype) \
25  for (arraytype::const_iterator varname = arrayname.begin(); \
26  varname != arrayname.end(); \
27  ++varname)

72  template <typename TString>
73  class TreeT
74  {
75  public:
76 
77  typedef TreeT<TString> ThisClass;
78  typedef typename std::list<ThisClass> List;
79 
80  public:
81 
82  TreeT()
83  {
84  m_Info = 0;
85  }
86

88  void Name(const TString& name);

143  TValue ChildVar(TString strKey,

150  bool IsVar() const;

152  // Utility methods
153  //
154  template <typename TValue>
155  TString VarToString(TValue var) const;
156  template <typename TValue>
157  TValue StringToVar(const TString& str) const;
158  template <typename TValue>
159  unsigned char VarID() const;
160  bool IsBranch() const
161  {
162  return m_Info == 0;
163  }
164

166 
167  TString m_Name;
168  TString m_Value;

171  List m_Children;

174 
175  //
176  // We have a normal version and a wide version by default
177  // Although the wide version is probably a waste of time since
178  // nothing supports it right now.
179  //
180  typedef TreeT<BString> Tree;
181  typedef TreeT<WString> TreeW;
182 
183 
184  //
185  // Template function definitions
186  //
187  template <typename TString>
188  inline const TString& TreeT<TString>::Name() const
189  {
190  return m_Name;
191  }
192 
193  template <typename TString>
194  inline void TreeT<TString>::Name(const TString& name)
195  {
196  m_Name = name;
197  }
198 
199  template <typename TString>
200  inline const TString& TreeT<TString>::Value() const
201  {
202  return m_Value;
203  }
204 
205  template <typename TString>
206  inline void TreeT<TString>::Value(const TString& value)
207  {
208  m_Info = 1;
209  m_Value = value;
210  }
211 
212  template <typename TString>
213  inline TreeT<TString>& TreeT<TString>::AddChild()
214  {
215  {
216  TreeT<TString> t;
217  m_Children.push_back(t);
218  }
219 
220  TreeT<TString>& t = m_Children.back();
221  return t;
222  }
223 
224  template <typename TString>
225  inline TreeT<TString>& TreeT<TString>::AddChild(TString name)
226  {
227  TreeT<TString>& tree = AddChild();
228  tree.Name(name);
229  return tree;
230  }
231 
232  template <typename TString>
233  inline TreeT<TString>& TreeT<TString>::SetChild(TString strKey, TString strValue)
234  {
235  TreeT<TString>& tchild = AddChild(strKey);
236  tchild.Value(strValue);
237  return tchild;
238  }
239 
240  template <typename TString>
241  inline TString TreeT<TString>::ChildValue(const TString& name, const TString& Default) const
242  {
243  GWENUTIL_FOREACH_CONST(a, Children(), typename List)
244  {
245  if (a->Name() == name)
246  return a->Value();
247  }
248 
249  return Default;
250  }
251 
252  template <typename TString>
253  inline bool TreeT<TString>::HasChild(const TString& name) const
254  {
255  GWENUTIL_FOREACH_CONST(a, Children(), typename List)
256  {
257  if (a->Name() == name)
258  return true;
259  }
260 
261  return false;
262  }
263 
264  template <typename TString>
265  inline TreeT<TString>& TreeT<TString>::GetChild(const TString& name)
266  {
267  GWENUTIL_FOREACH(a, Children(), typename List)
268  {
269  if (a->Name() == name)
270  return *a;
271  }
272 
273  return AddChild(name);
274  }
275 
276  template <typename TString>
277  inline bool TreeT<TString>::HasChildren() const
278  {
279  return !m_Children.empty();
280  }
281 
282  template <typename TString>
283  template <typename TValue>
284  inline TreeT<TString>& TreeT<TString>::SetChildVar(TString strKey, TValue var)
285  {
286  TreeT<TString>& tchild = AddChild(strKey);
287  tchild.Var<TValue>(var);
288  return tchild;
289  }
290 
291  template <typename TString>
292  template <typename TValue>
293  inline TValue TreeT<TString>::ChildVar(TString strKey, TValue varDefault) const
294  {
295  GWENUTIL_FOREACH_CONST(a, Children(), typename List)
296  {
297  if (a->Name() == strKey)
298  return a->template Var<TValue>();
299  }
300 
301  return varDefault;
302  }
303 
304  template <typename TString>
305  template <typename TValue>
306  inline void TreeT<TString>::Var(TValue var)
307  {
308  m_Info = VarID<TValue>();
309  m_Value = VarToString<TValue>(var);
310  }
311 
312  template <typename TString>
313  template <typename TValue>
314  inline TValue TreeT<TString>::Var() const
315  {
316  return StringToVar<TValue>(Value());
317  }
318 
319  template <typename TString>
320  template <typename TValue>
321  inline bool TreeT<TString>::IsVar() const
322  {
323  return m_Info == VarID<TValue>();
324  }
